name: Lp
body:
### The main purpose of the **LP Demo** project is to serve as a reference for the development of _Project Based Learning (PBL)_ methodology. The programming language selected is C ++ using QT libraries for developing graphical user interfaces.

It is intended that this project never ends, so every contribution by students or the university community will be sincerely grateful.

It was decided that the project's license is ECL (Educational Community License), which is compatible with GPL v.3 and earlier versions, as mentioned in (1).

**External Links**

1. [Educational Community License, From Wikipedia (08 May 2015)](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Educational_Community_License)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
